title: I can't be the only one who's happy summer is over – bring on miserable weather
text:
Kicking off her new weekly column for Stella magazine, Bryony embraces the realisation she isn’t a ‘summer person’ after all

I’ve always liked to think of myself as a Summer Person, because: well, who doesn’t like to think of themselves as a Summer Person? Summer People are bright and breezy. Summer People are cool, even when they’re hot. And boy oh boy, are Summer People hot. They have beach waves in their hair and sun-kissed bodies, and look like they can surf (no matter that I can’t). Summer People wear life like a light coat, or a sarong, maybe.

Whereas Winter People wear life like a suit of armour. Winter People wear life like Jon Snow in Game of Thrones. Whenever I heard someone say that...
description: Kicking off her new weekly column for Stella magazine, Bryony embraces the realisation she isn’t a ‘summer person’ after all
